name: Dino Mayhem
description:
Hello guys and welcome to my first game jam ever. This jam had a theme and a requirement, the theme was ON THE EDGE, and the requirement was BOSS. For my game you play as the big BOSS, Tyrannosaurus Rex and you battle against a pack of Velociraptors, all the while you are ON THE EDGE of extinction. At any minute a meteor can crash and kill your entire species, and you can't do anything about it except fighting against your own kind. Hope you will like it :)

!!!PLEASE ENTER ON FULLSCREEN MODE BY PRESSING THE BOTTOM LEFT BUTTON!!!

CONTROLS: 

MOVE - ARROW KEYS

BITE - Hold Z

FIRE - Hold X
